title: Sell Hunter Laing Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Hunter Laing Whisky | Old Malt Cask & Old & Rare | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Hunter Laing whisky. We buy the Old & Rare Platinum selection, Old Malt Cask, and First Editions bottlings.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Old & Rare Platinum and Old Malt Cask.
introParagraph: Hunter Laing, split from Douglas Laing in 2013, holds massive stocks of aged whisky. Their flagship 'Old & Rare' Platinum series contains some of the best single casks ever bottled.
photoChecklist: Front label showing Vintage and Cask strength
conditionFactors: Box: The 'Old & Rare' wooden hinged box is substantial. Damage hurts resale.
Label: Verify 'Hunter Laing' vs 'Douglas Laing' (split happened in 2013).
Fill: Generally good, but check older vintages.
Wax: Some Platinum releases have wax dips.
pricingFactors: Series: Old & Rare Platinum > Old Malt Cask > First Editions.
Distillery: A Platinum Ardbeg is worth significantly more than a Platinum Teaninich.
Kinship: The Feis Ile 'Kinship' series is highly collectible.
Vintage: 30+ year old single grains in the Sovereign series are good value.

faqs.question: What is the difference between Hunter and Douglas Laing?
faqs.answer: Brothers Fred and Stewart split the company assets in 2013. Hunter Laing took the Old Malt Cask and Old & Rare brands.

faqs.question: Do you buy Old Malt Cask?
faqs.answer: Yes, specifically the 50% ABV releases. The gold label is iconic.

faqs.question: What is the Kinship series?
faqs.answer: A luxury series launched for the Ardnahoe distillery opening. Very high value.

faqs.question: Do you buy Sovereign?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are fans of aged single grain whisky (Cameronbridge, Port Dundas).

faqs.question: How do I ship the wooden box?
faqs.answer: Pad the bottle INSIDE the box, then bubble wrap the box.

faqs.question: Do you buy Scarabus?
faqs.answer: No, Scarabus is a core range malt, not a collector item.
